_header: In a goodly night as in my bed I lay
_description: An erotic dream vision — six 8-line stanzas

BodRawC813.First Lines:
In a goodly nyght as yn my bede I layeplesantlye slepyng thys dreme
                    I hadde…
BodRawC813.Last Lines:
…I had no thyng but my pylowe yn my armys lyyngfor when I
                    awoke ther was but I alone
